name: Roller Controller
description:
This prototype is part of the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Roll the ball and gain momentum using jumps and bounces! Think of the ball like a rubber ball / basket ball, and get to jumping and bouncing!

The theme of "Out of Control" can be found in a mechanism where the game takes control of your character, and you have to share controls and try to cope the troublesome extra input, or use it to your advantage!

Once you reach the playground area, you can toggle/disable the random inputs by pressing [V], it turned out a bit frustrating, sorry!

Mark made me do it :(

Controls

  • Move: WSAD or Left Stick with a controller
  • Jump:
    • Use this to reach high platforms, gain speed in ramps or wall-jump!
    • SPACE or LMB, or [Face-button DOWN] with controller (X for PS4, A on Xbox).
  • Bounce:
    • Use this to SLAM INTO THE GROUND when you're jumping to gain downward momentum!
    • CTRL or RMB, or [Face-button LEFT] with controller (SQUARE for PS4, X on Xbox).

Debug

  • Restart: R
  • Toggle Randomness: V

The prototype build seems to only work on Windows 10. Some Unreal Engine 4.25 bug. Sorry!
